import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { RestaurantServiceService } from '../service/restaurant-service.service'; import Typed from 'typed.js' ; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { const typed = new Typed('.typing',{ //.typing is a target element // we, need to install Typed class from typed.js library // npm install typed.js strings:['your food now ðŸ˜‹ ',' different deserts..!!','many more..'], typeSpeed:100, backSpeed:60, loop:true }) } }
